senses.sense_definition: Located near the center or subordinate to a central authority; not quite central.

examples.text: The regional council exercises <w>subcentral</w> power over local development projects.
We visited a <w>subcentral</w> government office to file the necessary paperwork.

senses.sense_definition: Situated underneath or below the center point.

examples.text: The diagram indicates a <w>subcentral</w> point where the pressure is highest.
In this species, the nerve cluster is found in a <w>subcentral</w> position.
